name: Zumba - Drop-in
description: Zumba is an exercise fitness activity based on the rhythms of Latin dance music-- salsa, reggaetón, merengue and cumbia Dance with Zumba in the Parks! Free Zumba classes, allowing program participants to get outside, stay active and enjoy a fun, exhilarating activity with San Francisco parks as the backdrop.
